      • saveState

        public GameState saveState​(java.lang.String path,
                           MasterChef masterChef,
                           CustomerController customerController,
                           Difficulty difficultyLevel,
                           int timer,
                           float seconds,
                           java.util.List<GameObject> Stations,
                           java.util.List<GameObject> customerCounters,
                           java.util.List<GameObject> assemblyStations)
        Save the state of the game without the need for a GameScreen.
        Parameters:
        path - File path
        masterChef - chef controller
        customerController - customer controller class
        difficultyLevel - the games current difficulty level
        timer - minute state of the timer
        seconds - second state of the timer
        Stations - List of station
        customerCounters - List of customercounters
        assemblyStations - List of assembly stations
        Returns:
        The created game state

      • saveState

        public void saveState​(GameState state,
                      java.lang.String path)
        Saves a game state to disk under the given path
        Parameters:
        state - GameState variables that the game has been saved under
        path - File path

      • saveGameScreen

        public void saveGameScreen​(GameState state,
                           Difficulty difficultyLevel,
                           int timer,
                           float seconds,
                           java.util.List<GameObject> Stations,
                           java.util.List<GameObject> customerCounters,
                           java.util.List<GameObject> assemblyStations)
        Saves the state of the game screen.
        Parameters:
        state - The state to save to
        difficultyLevel - The difficulty level of the game
        timer - The timer of the game
        seconds - The number of seconds the game has been running for (used for the timer)
        Stations - The stations in the game
        customerCounters - The customer counters in the game
        assemblyStations - The assembly stations in the game

      • loadState

        public GameState loadState​(java.lang.String ID)
        Load the current state into a GameState variable
        Parameters:
        ID - file path
        Returns:
        GameState loaded in from disk
